comment.body: I think there are a lot more users who would really like to subscribe (like me), but in his / her country, very few movies / series available. I think VPN couldn't be a solution, when I pay for a service and then I have to pay to another service to be able to use that, ... no way.
and yes, VPN blockade won't hurt netflix, it hurts their best customers who are willing to put extra efforts to use the service, but netflix just don't care.
